gal.republica.coego.demiurgo.lib

Interface ServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface ServerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This class serves to create a RMI object that acts as a proxy for user interfaces, web interface for example.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Martín Coego Pérez
